publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-411# Mr Kenny MacAskill: Harewood Park and Meggetland Development—That the Parliament acknowledges the importance of National Planning Policy Guideline 11 for the continued maintenance and preservation of playing fields and sports pitches; notes with concern the development proposals for Harewood Park and Meggetland in the City of Edinburgh and reiterates to local authorities and other bodies the necessity of wherever possible preserving and enhancing green space in urban Scotland. Supported by: Michael Russell*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Alex Neil*, Shona Robison*, Linda Fabiani*, Irene McGugan*, Michael Matheson*, Mrs Margaret Smith*, Donald Gorrie*, Robin Harper*, David McLetchie*, Ms Margo MacDonald*, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-411# Harewood Park and Meggetland Development (lodged on 12 January 2000) Fergus Ewing*

S1M-411# Mr Kenny MacAskill: Harewood Park and Meggetland Development—That the Parliament acknowledges the importance of National Planning Policy Guideline 11 for the continued maintenance and preservation of playing fields and sports pitches; notes with concern the development proposals for Harewood Park and Meggetland in the City of Edinburgh and reiterates to local authorities and other bodies the necessity of wherever possible preserving and enhancing green space in urban Scotland. Supported by: Michael Russell, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Alex Neil, Shona Robison, Linda Fabiani, Irene McGugan, Michael Matheson, Mrs Margaret Smith, Donald Gorrie, Robin Harper, David McLetchie, Ms Margo MacDonald, Fiona Hyslop, Fergus Ewing
